fields.name: Warding Totem (Trinket)
fields.description: Limited to 1 Trinket. Active: Places a Stealth Ward that lasts 60 seconds (120 second cooldown). At level 9, this ward's duration increases to 120 seconds. Limit 3 Stealth Wards on the map per player. (Trinkets cannot be used in the first 30 seconds of a game. Selling a Trinket will disable Trinket use for 120 seconds).
